'''Cutiefly''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''アブリー''' ''Abuly'') is a dual-type {{2t|Bug|Fairy}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation VII]].

It [[Evolution|evolves]] into {{p|Ribombee}} starting at [[level]] 25.

==Biology==
Cutiefly is a tiny Pokémon with comparatively large wings. It has a pale yellow body with a white face and tail. It has large eyes with spots resembling pixels in them, a long brown nose, and two tiny transparent tufts on its head resembling antennae. The wings on its back are wide and flat. They are white with brown loop markings toward the bottom and have a white tuft of hair between them. It has four spindly legs with round feet.

Cutiefly is capable of detecting the aura of living things, such as plants, people, and Pokémon. It uses this ability to predict the movements of its opponents. It collects nectar and pollen from flowers, which are found by the color and brightness of their auras. However, when a living creature is excited, its aura resembles flower in full bloom. As a result, Cutiefly tends to gather around beings feeling strong emotions. This Pokémon can be found in fields and meadows, but is sometimes attracted to towns or buildings by the emotions of living beings.<ref>http://www.pokemon-sunmoon.com/en-us/pokemon/cutiefly/</ref> Loving nectar and pollen, it often gets into skirmishes with {{p|Butterfree}} over food. {{p|Spinarak}} is a natural predator of Cutiefly.

Three Cutiefly appeared in ''[[SM046|Deceiving Appearances!]]''.

A Cutiefly appeared in [[SM056]].

Multiple Cutiefly appeared in [[SM059]], during a flashback.

==Trivia==
* No other Pokémon has the same [[type]] [[List of Pokémon with unique type combinations|combination]] as Cutiefly and its {{p|Ribombee|evolution}}.
* Cutiefly and its {{p|Ribombee|evolution}} are the only Pokémon to have the [[Egg Group]] combination of {{egg|Bug}} and {{egg|Fairy}}.
* Cutiefly is tied with {{p|Joltik}}, {{p|Flabébé}}, {{p|Comfey}} and {{p|Cosmoem}} as the [[List of Pokémon by height|smallest]] Pokémon.
* Cutiefly is the only unevolved Pokémon that can learn {{m|Quiver Dance}}.
* Cutiefly is the [[List of Pokémon by weight|lightest]] {{type|Bug}} Pokémon.

===Origin===
Cutiefly appears to be based on the {{wp|Bombyliidae|bee fly}}.

====Name origin====
Cutiefly may be a combination of ''cutie-pie'' and ''bee fly''.

Abuly may be a combination of 吊虻 ''tsuriabu'' (bee fly), ''lovely'', and フェアリー ''fairy''.
